banner.title: Are you tired of queues in hospitals?
banner.subtitle: Get quality doctor visits from home with DOVIRA.

ourServices.description1: Connect with qualified doctors through high-quality video calls. Get medical advice and consultations from the comfort of your home.
ourServices.description2: With DOVIRA, get prescriptions from our online doctors directly in the app. Download them for easy access whenever necessary.
ourServices.description3: Have a question or need medical advice? Use our chat service to get prompt responses from experienced doctors.
ourServices.description4: DOVIRA cares for your pets too! Request a vet house call or schedule a video consultation to ensure your furry friends get the medical attention they need.

whyChoose.description1: Access quality healthcare services without leaving your home, saving you time and hassle.
whyChoose.description2: From human health to veterinary care, DOVIRA offers a wide range of medical services to meet all your needs.
whyChoose.description3: Our team consists of experienced and licensed medical professionals who provide compassionate care tailored to your specific requirements.
whyChoose.description4: Connect with a doctor anytime, day or night, and receive the consultation you need without delay.

priorities.title: Try our web version
priorities.description: Enjoy all the features of DOVIRA right from your browser. No downloads needed - just visit our website and start your consultation today!

getStarted.title: Get started today!
getStarted.description: Experience the convenience and peace of mind that DOVIRA offers. Download the app now and take control of your health journey with just a few taps. Your health is important to us, and we're here to help every step of the way.

contact.text: If you have any questions, please, feel free to contact us through social media and send us a message.
